structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Looking for Another Job Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of job search motivation categories indicating why employed individuals are seeking alternative employment opportunities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Total
structure:Code.common:Description: Total for the specified category or dimension.

structure:Code.common:Name: Better working conditions
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals seeking another job to improve their working conditions, such as better hours, environment, or workplace policies.

structure:Code.common:Name: Transitional job
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals whose current job is considered temporary or transitional while seeking more permanent or suitable employment.

structure:Code.common:Name: Seeking additional job
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals looking for an additional job to supplement their current income or gain additional work experience.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other reasons
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals seeking another job for reasons not covered by other categories, such as personal development, career change, or location preferences.

structure:Code.common:Name: Job loss risk or certainty
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals seeking another job due to risk or certainty of losing their current position, including termination, layoffs, or business closure.
